inclusion.criterion: listed for implantation of micro-invasive glaucoma surgical devices
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Advanced glaucoma (as defined as cup-disc ratio ≥ 0.9 and/or a visual field defect within central 10˚ of fixation)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: diagnosis of glaucoma other than POAG and PACG
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has abdominal pain and vomiting, with a history of alcohol consumption and smoking. He is healthy with no history of allergies or using any medications.
